name: Intro
commands: So we need to keep you safe for 8 turns for you to....|do what exactly?

The spell will completely reject all of the undead monsters roaming around the city.|It will also briefly prevent any more monsters from coming in from the outside.|The castle is a completely different matter.
Wait...what's going on with the castle?

...Let's discuss that after we deal with this matter first yes?|To start,there's a necromancer here that's been summoning monsters.|I've set up a small barrier around the tavern so they won't be able to warp directly on us.
Is there any way for us to deal with the necromancer?

No, if I can complete my spell,| the necromancer should be taken care of directly.|I'm going to commit to finishing this spell so I can't cancel it to defend myself.|I'll be completely defenseless during this so my wellbeing is in your hands.
Is there any other magic you can teach me before we get ready?

...No, I don't think we'll have time to teach you more advanced spells.|That lightning spell should be sufficient on its own if mastered.|But I can at least give you some weapons that will actually hurt the damn monsters.
These are... holy artifacts aren't they?
What's left of them.|These don't even hold a fraction of the strength they once held.|Now let's clean this place up shall we?
